package.name: BetterCam
package.shortDescription: iPhone 11 Camera features for Older iPhones

descriptionlist.description: 11Cam adds the iPhone 11 Camera Features to Dual Cam iPhone
iPhone 11 Zoom and Flip Control. Depth and Intensity Control with High Key Mono. Portrait Lighting for iPhone 7 Plus.
iPhone 7 Plus, 8 Plus running iOS 13 or later
Thanks to lilacvibes_ who helped implement the different zoom levels
